verses.verse: אַ֣לְלַי <S%H480><s%> Woe לִ֗י כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For הָיִ֙יתִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> I am כְּאָסְפֵּי־ <S%H625><s%> is me for I am as when they have gathered קַ֔יִץ <S%H7019><s%> the summer fruits כְּעֹלְלֹ֖ת <S%H5955><s%> as the grapegleanings בָּצִ֑יר <S%H1210><s%> of the vintage אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> There אֶשְׁכּ֣וֹל <S%H811><s%> [there is] no cluster לֶאֱכ֔וֹל <S%H398><s%> to eat בִּכּוּרָ֖ה <S%H1063><s%> the firstripe fruit אִוְּתָ֥ה <S%H183><s%> desired נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> my soul

אָבַ֤ד <S%H6><s%> [man] is perished חָסִיד֙ <S%H2623><s%> The good מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the earth וְיָשָׁ֥ר <S%H3477><s%> and [there is] none upright בָּאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> among men אָ֑יִן <S%H369><s%> and there כֻּלָּם֙ <S%H3605><s%> All לְדָמִ֣ים <S%H1818><s%> for blood יֶאֱרֹ֔בוּ <S%H693><s%> they all lie in wait אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָחִ֖יהוּ <S%H251><s%> his brother יָצ֥וּדוּ <S%H6679><s%> they hunt חֵֽרֶם׃ <S%H2764><s%> with a net

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> Concerning הָרַ֤ע <S%H7451><s%> That they may do evil כַּפַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H3709><s%> with both hands לְהֵיטִ֔יב <S%H3190><s%> earnestly הַשַּׂ֣ר <S%H8269><s%> the prince שֹׁאֵ֔ל <S%H7592><s%> asketh וְהַשֹּׁפֵ֖ט <S%H8199><s%> and the judge בַּשִּׁלּ֑וּם <S%H7966><s%> [asketh] for a reward וְהַגָּד֗וֹל <S%H1419><s%> and the great דֹּבֵ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> [man] he uttereth הַוַּ֥ת <S%H1942><s%> his mischievous נַפְשׁ֛וֹ <S%H5315><s%> desire ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> they וַֽיְעַבְּתֽוּהָ׃ <S%H5686><s%> so they wrap it up

טוֹבָ֣ם <S%H2896><s%> The best כְּחֵ֔דֶק <S%H2312><s%> of them [is] as a brier יָשָׁ֖ר <S%H3477><s%> the most upright מִמְּסוּכָ֑ה <S%H4534><s%> [is sharper] than a thorn hedge י֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> the day מְצַפֶּ֙יךָ֙ <S%H6822><s%> of thy watchmen פְּקֻדָּתְךָ֣ <S%H6486><s%> [and] thy visitation בָ֔אָה <S%H935><s%> cometh עַתָּ֥ה <S%H6258><s%> Then תִהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> will occur מְבוּכָתָֽם׃ <S%H3998><s%> now shall be their perplexity

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תַּאֲמִ֣ינוּ <S%H539><s%> Trust בְרֵ֔עַ <S%H7453><s%> ye not in a friend אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּבְטְח֖וּ <S%H982><s%> put ye not confidence בְּאַלּ֑וּף <S%H441><s%> in a guide מִשֹּׁכֶ֣בֶת <S%H7901><s%> from her that lieth חֵיקֶ֔ךָ <S%H2436><s%> in thy bosom שְׁמֹ֖ר <S%H8104><s%> keep פִּתְחֵי־ <S%H6607><s%> the doors פִֽיךָ׃ <S%H6310><s%> of thy mouth

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For בֵן֙ <S%H1121><s%> For the son מְנַבֵּ֣ל <S%H5034><s%> dishonoureth אָ֔ב <S%H1><s%> the father בַּ֚ת <S%H1323><s%> the daughter קָמָ֣ה <S%H6965><s%> riseth up בְאִמָּ֔הּ <S%H517><s%> against her mother כַּלָּ֖ה <S%H3618><s%> the daughter in law בַּחֲמֹתָ֑הּ <S%H2545><s%> against her mother in law אֹיְבֵ֥י <S%H341><s%> enemies אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a man's אַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H582><s%> [are] the men בֵיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1004><s%> of his own house

וַאֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I בַּיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֲצַפֶּ֔ה <S%H6822><s%> Therefore I will look אוֹחִ֖ילָה <S%H3176><s%> I will wait לֵאלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> for the God יִשְׁעִ֑י <S%H3468><s%> of my salvation יִשְׁמָעֵ֖נִי <S%H8085><s%> will hear אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <S%H430><s%> my God

אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תִּשְׂמְחִ֤י <S%H8056><s%> glad אֹיַ֙בְתִּי֙ <S%H341><s%> not against me O mine enemy לִ֔י כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> Though נָפַ֖לְתִּי <S%H5307><s%> when I fall קָ֑מְתִּי <S%H6965><s%> I shall arise כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Though אֵשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> when I sit בַּחֹ֔שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> in darkness יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD א֥וֹר <S%H216><s%> [shall be] a light לִֽי׃ ס

זַ֤עַף <S%H2197><s%> the indignation יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶשָּׂ֔א <S%H5375><s%> I will bear כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> Because חָטָ֖אתִי <S%H2398><s%> because I have sinned ל֑וֹ עַד֩ <S%H5704><s%> against אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> he יָרִ֤יב <S%H7378><s%> against him until he plead רִיבִי֙ <S%H7379><s%> my cause וְעָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> and execute מִשְׁפָּטִ֔י <S%H4941><s%> judgment יוֹצִיאֵ֣נִי <S%H3318><s%> for me he will bring me forth לָא֔וֹר <S%H216><s%> to the light אֶרְאֶ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> [and] I shall behold בְּצִדְקָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H6666><s%> his righteousness

וְתֵרֶ֤א <S%H7200><s%> shall see אֹיַ֙בְתִּי֙ <S%H341><s%> Then [she that is] mine enemy וּתְכַסֶּ֣הָ <S%H3680><s%> shall cover בוּשָׁ֔ה <S%H955><s%> [it] and shame הָאֹמְרָ֣ה <S%H559><s%> her which said אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> about אַיּ֖וֹ <S%H346><s%> where יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto me Where is the LORD אֱלֹהָ֑יִךְ <S%H430><s%> angels עֵינַי֙ <S%H5869><s%> affliction תִּרְאֶ֣ינָּה <S%H7200><s%> shall behold בָּ֔הּ עַתָּ֛ה <S%H6258><s%> time תִּֽהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לְמִרְמָ֖ס <S%H4823><s%> her now shall she be trodden down כְּטִ֥יט <S%H2916><s%> as the mire חוּצֽוֹת׃ <S%H2351><s%> of the streets

י֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> [In] the day לִבְנ֣וֹת <S%H1129><s%> are to be built גְּדֵרָ֑יִךְ <S%H1447><s%> that thy walls י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> [in] that day הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יִרְחַק־ <S%H7368><s%> be far removed חֹֽק׃ <S%H2706><s%> shall the decree

י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> [In] that day הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he וְעָדֶ֣יךָ <S%H5704><s%> they יָב֔וֹא <S%H935><s%> [also] he shall come לְמִנִּ֥י <S%H4480><s%> From אַשּׁ֖וּר <S%H804><s%> even to thee from Assyria וְעָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> cities מָצ֑וֹר <S%H4692><s%> besieged וּלְמִנִּ֤י <S%H4480><s%> at מָצוֹר֙ <S%H4693><s%> and [from] the fortified וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> even נָהָ֔ר <S%H5104><s%> even to the river וְיָ֥ם <S%H3220><s%> and from sea מִיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> to sea וְהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> and [from] mountain הָהָֽר׃ <S%H2022><s%> to mountain

וְהָיְתָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> will become הָאָ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> Notwithstanding the land לִשְׁמָמָ֖ה <S%H8077><s%> shall be desolate עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because יֹֽשְׁבֶ֑יהָ <S%H3427><s%> because of them that dwell מִפְּרִ֖י <S%H6529><s%> therein for the fruit מַֽעַלְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4611><s%> of their doings ס

רְעֵ֧ה <S%H7462><s%> Feed עַמְּךָ֣ <S%H5971><s%> thy people בְשִׁבְטֶ֗ךָ <S%H7626><s%> with thy rod צֹ֚אן <S%H6629><s%> the flock נַֽחֲלָתֶ֔ךָ <S%H5159><s%> of thine heritage שֹׁכְנִ֣י <S%H7931><s%> which dwell לְבָדָ֔ד <S%H910><s%> solitarily יַ֖עַר <S%H3293><s%> [in] the wood בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst כַּרְמֶ֑ל <S%H3760><s%> of Carmel יִרְע֥וּ <S%H7462><s%> let them feed בָשָׁ֛ן <S%H1316><s%> [in] Bashan וְגִלְעָ֖ד <S%H1568><s%> and Gilead כִּימֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> as in the days עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> of old

כִּימֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> According to the days צֵאתְךָ֖ <S%H3318><s%> of thy coming מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt אַרְאֶ֖נּוּ <S%H7200><s%> will I shew נִפְלָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6381><s%> unto him marvellous

יִרְא֤וּ <S%H7200><s%> shall see גוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> The nations וְיֵבֹ֔שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> and be confounded מִכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> of all גְּבֽוּרָתָ֑ם <S%H1369><s%> at all their might יָשִׂ֤ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> they shall lay יָד֙ <S%H3027><s%> [their] hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פֶּ֔ה <S%H6310><s%> upon [their] mouth אָזְנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H241><s%> their ears תֶּחֱרַֽשְׁנָה׃ <S%H2790><s%> shall be deaf

יְלַחֲכ֤וּ <S%H3897><s%> They shall lick עָפָר֙ <S%H6083><s%> the dust כַּנָּחָ֔שׁ <S%H5175><s%> like a serpent כְּזֹחֲלֵ֣י <S%H2119><s%> like worms אֶ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth יִרְגְּז֖וּ <S%H7264><s%> they shall move מִמִּסְגְּרֹֽתֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H4526><s%> out of their holes אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H430><s%> our God יִפְחָ֔דוּ <S%H6342><s%> they shall be afraid וְיִֽרְא֖וּ <S%H3372><s%> and shall fear מִמֶּֽךָּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> before

מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who אֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> Who [is] a God כָּמ֗וֹךָ <S%H3644><s%> like נֹשֵׂ֤א <S%H5375><s%> like unto thee that pardoneth עָוֹן֙ <S%H5771><s%> iniquity וְעֹבֵ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> and passeth by עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over פֶּ֔שַׁע <S%H6588><s%> the transgression לִשְׁאֵרִ֖ית <S%H7611><s%> of the remnant נַחֲלָת֑וֹ <S%H5159><s%> heritage לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הֶחֱזִ֤יק <S%H2388><s%> aid לָעַד֙ <S%H5703><s%> for ever אַפּ֔וֹ <S%H639><s%> not his anger כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because חָפֵ֥ץ <S%H2654><s%> because he delighteth חֶ֖סֶד <S%H2617><s%> [in] mercy הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> He

יָשׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> He will turn again יְרַֽחֲמֵ֔נוּ <S%H7355><s%> he will have compassion יִכְבֹּ֖שׁ <S%H3533><s%> upon us he will subdue עֲוֹֽנֹתֵ֑ינוּ <S%H5771><s%> our iniquities וְתַשְׁלִ֛יךְ <S%H7993><s%> and thou wilt cast בִּמְצֻל֥וֹת <S%H4688><s%> into the depths יָ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חַטֹּאותָֽם׃ <S%H2403><s%> all their sins

תִּתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> Thou wilt perform אֱמֶת֙ <S%H571><s%> the truth לְיַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> to Jacob חֶ֖סֶד <S%H2617><s%> [and] the mercy לְאַבְרָהָ֑ם <S%H85><s%> to Abraham אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> Which נִשְׁבַּ֥עְתָּ <S%H7650><s%> which thou hast sworn לַאֲבֹתֵ֖ינוּ <S%H1><s%> unto our fathers מִ֥ימֵי <S%H3117><s%> from the days קֶֽדֶם׃ <S%H6924><s%> of old
